game.name: DCS: F-4 MiG Killers Campaign by Reflected Simulations
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: By 1969 the US Navy found themselves losing the battle for the skies over North Vietnam. Their kill ratio fell to a dismal 2 to 1.
game.shortDescriptionEn: By 1969 the US Navy found themselves losing the battle for the skies over North Vietnam. Their kill ratio fell to a dismal 2 to 1.
